mapper.select: select * from comment where post_id=#{post_id} order by id, parent_comment_id, depth
mapper.insert: insert into comment (ip, contents, parent_comment_id, depth, is_hide, post_id) values (#{ip}, #{contents}, #{parent_comment_id}, #{depth}, #{is_hide}, #{post_id})
mapper.update: update comment set contents=#{contents}, is_hide=#{is_hide} where id=#{id}
